name: Blue Ballot Server App
tagline: Server Application for the BlueBallot Voting System
body:
This is the Server Administrator Application for the **Blue Ballot Voting System**.

Fell free to clone the repository and use the code as you will :) But if you use anything, please give credit to the original creator, whether that is me or someone I've used stuff from.

The java executable can be found [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ivuaj6m0kxe4tit/ServerApp.jar)

Checkout the rest of the System at [github.com/alexisvincent/](github.com/alexisvincent/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
